title: Sapphire
description: We all know the story. You know, the one about the sleeping princess? About how she pricked her finger and fell into a deep sleep? Well, this is that story. Only, was she really asleep? And what really woke her from her slumber?Aurora Bellentyne lives in a peaceful kingdom. That is until she takes a walk in the royal gardens and pricks her finger on the thorn of a Sapphire Rose. Waking up, she finds herself surrounded by a forest made straight out of someoneâ€™s wildest dreams. Or nightmares. Terrified, she runs and finds herself in Sapphire, a town in an entirely different country. After getting arrested for stabbing a town guard, and thrown in jail, she escapes the noose with a pair of criminals and starts the journey of her life, trying to get back home. How long can she hide who she is? And how long can she survive before her time runs out? After all, being soul separated has a deadline.One Princess.Two criminals.Can they beat the clock?
author: Snow A. E. White
